game.name: Onde
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 이 매끄러운 사운드 서핑 플랫폼 게임에서 웨이브를 타보세요. 신비로운 선율과 함께 평온하고 추상적인 풍경을 따라 부드럽게 흘러가고, 마음을 진정시키는 사운드 스피어에 귀를 기울이고, 명상적인 생의 여정을 마음껏 즐기세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Catch a wave in this smooth sound-surfing platformer: Let ethereal tunes carry you fluidly through serene abstract landscapes, tune into soothing sound spheres and revel in a meditative journey of life.

reviewHighlights.text: It looks cool and interesting from pictures and videos..but in reality isn't ..controls feels rigid ..like even if you spam still pretty much nothing...
Onde is a serene and highly atmospheric puzzle-platforming experience developed by Lance and 3-50, and published by Assemble Entertainment, that place...
